question:
During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a chain of restaurants. You talked to him and he suggested that you should contact him about a possible job in one of his restaurants. Write a letter to this businessman. In your letter …




• Remind him when and where you met.
• Tell him what kind of job you are interested in.
• Say why you think you would be suitable for the job.
text: I am writing this letter to talk to you about the job offer you made to me when we were travelling together .My name is Abraham and I was travelling from Dubai to Hyderabad on the Emirates airline on the 25th of March.I was seated next to you . During our conversation,I was impressed to learn that you have a chain of hotels in the UAE as well as Hyderabad.You offered me a job in your hotel,The Taj Banjara, and advised me to contact you if I was interested in your offer.

I have done graduation in computer science engineering  from the University of Brisbane and also I hold a masters degree in Business administration.I am currently working in the IT department of a hotel,The seasons.I have 5 years of experience as a specialist in the front office as a senior Data officer.
I am a hard-working and dedicated person,always focusing on the progress of the company I work for.I value the importance of teamwork and till now have fulfilled all my responsibilities diligently.
I hope to further my career growth working for your hotel.
